do u like puzzle games? then try this.
the game released in 2007 but u can enjoy it in 2021 and even next years if u still didnt play it.
This game is really fun. I played portal 2 first and then got the original. Im still trying to beat the game üòÖ definitely a great challenge
What can I say, a game with a great plot, jumping through portals and GLADOS, we need more such games;)

Genuinely, I think this game is amazing. Even though it could get you around 3-5 hrs of gameplay, the aspect of the game is just jaw-dropping. Portals? That amazed my mind, it was so mind-blowing on how someone could implement the concept of Portals.

10/10. Great game as always, Valve.

Shoot portals and go through them

I played and completed this years ago, back when the Orange Box was first released. I decided to buy it again in a Steam sale. I completed it in one sitting.

This game is still one of my favourite games ever. The puzzles are great, the humour and dialogue are fantastic and the game has the best credit screen ever.

I couldn't recommend this more.
